逍遙法外.definition: unfettered and beyond the law (idiom); evading retribution; getting away with it (e.g. crimes); still at large

逍遙自在.definition: free and at leisure (idiom); unfettered; outside the reach of the law (of criminal); at large

逍遙自得.definition: doing as one pleases (idiom); foot-loose and fancy free
